contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|CRM}} '''CRM''' may refer to: {{tocright}} == Sales and marketing == * [[Customer relationship management]], processes implemented to manage a company's interactions with customers and prospects * [[Cause-related marketing]] * [[Courtesy reply mail]], a type of business mail == Companies and institutions == * [[Centre de Recherches Mathématiques]], a Canadian mathematical research institute * Centre for Regenerative Medicine, at the [[Scottish Centre for Regenerative Medicine]] * [[Comas Racing Management]], a driver management firm of [[Érik Comas]] * [[Commander Mexicana]]'s [[Airline codes-C|ICAO code]] == Management == === Resource management === * [[Crew resource management]] or Cockpit Resource Management, an aviation training program * [[Cultural resources management]] === Other management === * [[Certified resident manager]], a professional designation in property management * [[Certified Risk Manager]], a professional designation == Other uses == * [[Cis-regulatory module]], a region of DNA * [[Caloric restriction mimetic]], a substance that mimics the caloric restriction anti-aging effect * [[Cardiac rhythm management]] * [[Certified reference materials]], ‘controls’ or standards used to check the quality and traceability of products * [[CIDOC Conceptual Reference Model]], an international standard for the exchange of cultural heritage information * [[Civil rights movement]], an anti-racism campaign * [[Chittaranjan Mitra]] (1926–2008), or C. R. Mitra, an Indian scientist == See also == * [[CRM 114 (fictional device)]], a device in Stanley Kubrick's film ''Dr. Strangelove'' * [[CRM114 (program)]], a statistical classifier and pattern matching language commonly used to filter spam {{disambiguation}}
